dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6516 IH: Never Again Education Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carter of Georgia (for himself, Ms. Manning, Ms. Stefanik, Ms. Wasserman Schultz, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, Mr. Fitzpatrick, and Mr. Moolenaar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Director of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum to support Holocaust education programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Never Again Education Reauthorization Act of 2023.
Section 4(a) of the Never Again Education Act (Public Law 116â€“141) is amended by striking each of the 4 succeeding fiscal years and inserting each succeeding fiscal year through fiscal year 2030.
